info.title: Manzil API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for the e-commerce platform designed for suppliers, resellers, and customers in Pakistan to sell and manage their products.

post.description: Register a new customer and assign the 'Customer' role.

city_id.description: City ID (optional, must exist in cities table)

post.description: This endpoint registers a new supplier with both user and supplier-specific details.

city_id.description: City ID associated with the user

main_category_id.description: ID of the main product category

secondary_category_id.description: ID of the secondary product category

self_listing.description: Indicates if the supplier lists products themselves

using_daraz.description: Indicates if the supplier uses Daraz for selling

term_agreed.description: Indicates if the supplier has agreed to terms

marketing_type.description: Type of marketing used by the supplier

post.description: Send a password reset link to the user's registered email address.

500.description: Unable to send password reset link.

message.example: Unable to send password reset link.

post.description: Reset the user's password using the provided token.

error.example: The provided token is invalid or expired.

get.summary: Get a list of products for the authenticated supplier
get.description: Retrieve a list of products for the authenticated supplier with optional filters.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter by product name.

parameters.name: unit_selling_price
parameters.description: Filter by product unit selling price.

parameters.name: is_active
parameters.description: Filter by product activity status (true or false).

400.description: Bad request due to invalid parameters.

get.summary: Display a specific product by its ID
get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific product by its ID.

description.example: Dolor nemo velit et voluptatem numquam voluptas.

put.summary: Update a specific product by its ID
put.description: Update the details of a specific product identified by its ID.

403.description: You do not have permission to update this product

message.example: You do not have permission to update this product.

items.example: The selected category id is invalid.

delete.description: Delete a specific product by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product to delete

422.description: Cannot delete this product because it is linked to other records

message.example: Cannot delete this product because it is linked to other records.

post.description: Store a newly created product with the provided data.

category_id.description: The ID of the product's category

description.example: Dolor nemo velit et voluptatem numquam voluptas.

stock_quantity.description: The quantity of the product in stock

unit_selling_price.description: The selling price of the product

sku.description: A unique SKU for the product

is_active.description: Flag to indicate if the product is active

description.example: Dolor nemo velit et voluptatem numquam voluptas.

items.example: The selected category id is invalid.

patch.description: Deactivate a specific product by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product to deactivate
